thread.title: Russia open to 'cooperation' as spy in critical condition

title: Russia open to 'cooperation' as spy in critical condition
text:
Russia open to 'cooperation' as spy in critical condition 5:49am EST - 01:37 
The Kremlin says ''it didn't take them long'' for media speculation to surface that it was involved in the critical injury of Sergei Skripal, a former Russian spy exposed to an unknown substance in Britain.   
The Kremlin says "it didn't take them long" for media speculation to surface that it was involved in the critical injury of Sergei Skripal, a former Russian spy exposed to an unknown substance in Britain.  //reut.rs/2oTkmxt
